title: New: Regina Spektor – All The Rowboats
body: It’s been 3 years since [**Regina Spektor**’s](http://www.facebook.com/reginaspektor) remarkably more poppy effort, **_Far_**. 3 years; that’s a lot of time for me to lose interest in the Soviet Union born folkstress. The first track to be released from her new record, _[What We Saw From The Cheap Seats](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/What_We_Saw_From_The_Cheap_Seats),_ is a sharp powerhouse of a single and more than enough to spark my interest again. Piano based as always, it lacks that much needed quirk of early **Spektor**, but with song-writing this good is it even needed?
